// This file is auto-generated. Do not edit manually.
// Structure: BinarySearch
#pragma once
#include <array>
#include <cstdint>
#include <limits>
#include <string_view>

class BinarySearchStructure_Int32_3_simple final {
    inline static const std::array<int32_t, 3> values = {
        1, 2, 3
    };
    static constexpr std::array<int32_t, 3> keys = {
        1, 2, 3
    };

public:
    [[nodiscard]]
    static constexpr bool contains(const int32_t key) noexcept {
        if (key < 1 || key > 3)
            return false;

        int32_t lo = 0;
        int32_t hi = 2;
        while (lo <= hi) {
            const int32_t mid = lo + ((hi - lo) >> 1);
            const int32_t mid_key = keys[mid];

            if (mid_key == key)
                return true;

            if (mid_key < key)
                lo = mid + 1;
            else
                hi = mid - 1;
        }

        return false;
    }
    [[nodiscard]]
    static bool try_lookup(const int32_t key, const int32_t*& value) noexcept {
        if (key < 1 || key > 3)
            {
    value = nullptr;
    return false;
}

        int32_t lo = 0;
        int32_t hi = 2;
        while (lo <= hi) {
            const int32_t mid = lo + ((hi - lo) >> 1);
            const int32_t mid_key = keys[mid];

            if (mid_key == key)
            {
                value = &values[mid];
                return true;
            }

            if (mid_key < key)
                lo = mid + 1;
            else
                hi = mid - 1;
        }

        value = nullptr;
        return false;
    }

    static constexpr size_t item_count = 3;
    static constexpr int32_t min_key = 1;
    static constexpr int32_t max_key = 3;
};
